channel.title: Science/Tech
channel.description:
Science seems to be getting better latest thing i heard is that soon they have tested that if your leg is cut off it will be able for it to grow back. What will Science/Tech come up with next? or is this even possible.
Debate.

item.title: Science/Tech
item.dc:creator: @Squigglyo Squigglyo
item.description:
@Squigglyo wrote:

[quote=“Kane., post:8, topic:255280”]Discovery/Science channel always have interesting futuristic propositions, theories and new inventions. It’s extremely fascinating to watch how fast technology is advancing.

They’ve made sports cars that you drive into the water and they turn into speed boats- pretty sweet.
But, we probably won’t be able to access them - unless you’re insanely rich - until a few decades later.[/quote]

James Bond had one of these like 40 years ago. Get with the times man

Read full topic

Discovery/Science channel always have interesting futuristic propositions, theories and new inventions. It’s extremely fascinating to watch how fast technology is advancing.

item.title: Science/Tech
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

[quote=“Ske, post:6, topic:255280”]Giving up an unborn non-conscious foetus to grow back or heal things of a conscious person is good enough for me.
It’s not like the foetus is realising he’s getting killed or something.[/quote]
he/she/shemale.

Read full topic

item.title: Science/Tech
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

using a dead foetus to make you grow new shit, I think they call it “stem cell research”.

Read full topic

item.title: Science/Tech
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

Christians and some activists (I’ll try not to make this into another debate about religion, I swear) hold back development that is very important. Like stem cell research. If I’m right (but I’m not sure I am so don’t quote me on it) you can recreate a leg with stem cells.

Stem cells are blank cells right? So with them you can make blood cells, skin cells, muscle cells etc.

Read full topic

item.description:

if your leg is cut off it will be able for it to grow back.
[/quote]
proof?
i don’t want to sound like a dick but it would be an interesting read[/quote]
My dad said he heard this on the news i will try to find it.

Read full topic
